title: Practice Challenge: Set Operations
description:
You're building a team management system. Use Set methods to:

1. Find developers who work on BOTH frontend AND backend (intersection)
2. Find developers who ONLY work on frontend (difference)
3. Combine all developers into one team (union)
4. Check if the senior team is a subset of all developers
instructions: Use the new Set methods: union(), intersection(), difference(), and isSubsetOf()

testCases.description: Seniors are subset of all devs

hints.text: intersection() finds items in BOTH sets
difference(other) finds items in the set but NOT in other
isSubsetOf() returns true if all items exist in the other set

commonMistakes.mistake: Using filter instead of Set methods
commonMistakes.correction: Use intersection(), difference(), union() for cleaner code
A.difference(B) gives items in A but not B
